Edges-Weird -- Female Shapeshifter Seasoned Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d4 Vigor: d10
Skills (16 Points):
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Focus: (spi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Gambling: (sma) d4 Psionics: (sma) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Healing: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Skill Notes:
Beast Talker: May speak with chosen class of animals
Charismatic: May reroll Persuasion
Hard Of Hearing+: Deaf; automatically fails Notice (hearing)
Jingoistic: -2 Persuasion (characters from other cultures)
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 6; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (3 points): Aura Of Courage; Beast Talker; Rapid Change Hindrances: Hard Of Hearing+; Jingoistic; Phobia Shapeshifter Features: Change Shape; Charismatic; Secret+
Feature Notes:
Change Shape: Has Arcane Background (Gifted) feature
Phobia: Suffers -1 on Trait rolls in the presence of phobia subject
Rapid Change: May change form as a limited action
Secret+: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from major trouble
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Chakram (d4+d4 R4"); Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Quarterstaff (d4+d4); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Aura Of Courage: R10" Allies gain +1 vs. fear and -1 on fear table results
Chakram Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Jingoistic: Command edges do not effect allies from other cultures
Quarterstaff Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Arcana
Power Count: 1 Power Points: 15
Powers: Disguise: (2 PP) R6" Target assumes another's appearance (familiar Notice-2 sees through (Raise Notice-4)) for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows changing size by 2 steps)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Gifted): 1 Powers/15 Power Points
Change Shape: May use Disguise as a limited free action to change own appearance
Notes
Validation Errors: Rapid Change Edge: Requires lycanthropy feature
